entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
